'''Ororon''' is a playable {{Electro}} character in ''[[Genshin Impact]]''.

Born with an "incomplete" soul, Ororon is an oddball from the [[Masters of the Night-Wind]] who bears the [[Ancient Name]] {{Ancient Name|BDI|'''Bidii'''|bearer=1}}. He lives a humble life outside of the tribal grounds, tending to his vegetables and [[Phlogiston Aphid]]s.
